title: Sell Highland Park Scotch
metaTitle: Sell Highland Park Whisky | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Highland Park whisky. We buy 25 Year, 30 Year, 40 Year, Valhalla Collection, and single cask releases. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy vintage and aged Highland Park from Orkney.
introParagraph: Highland Park from Orkney balances smoke and honey notes. We are buyers for their premium core range (18, 25, 30, 40 Year), the Valhalla Collection (Thor, Odin, Loki, Freya), and single cask releases. Vintage bottlings from the 1960s and 70s are also highly sought after.
whatWeBuy: Highland Park Valhalla Collection (Thor, Odin, Loki, Freya)
photoChecklist: Box/Frame condition (Valhalla collection frames are wood)
conditionFactors: Wooden frame/plinth condition for Valhalla Collection
Box condition for aged statement bottles
pricingFactors: Collection completeness (Valhalla or Orcadian Vintage series)

faqs.question: Do you buy the Valhalla Collection?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy full sets or individual bottles of Thor, Odin, Loki, and Freya. The condition of the wooden frame is important.

faqs.question: Is older Highland Park 18 valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes, older bottlings of Highland Park 18 (round tube, pre-Viking branding) are more desirable than the current release.

faqs.question: Do you buy Single Casks?
faqs.answer: Yes, we purchase independent single casks and official distillery single cask releases.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Orcadian Vintage Series?
faqs.answer: Yes, the vintage releases (1964, 1968, 1970, etc.) are extremely valuable and we are active buyers.

faqs.question: How do I ship the wooden frame?
faqs.answer: The Valhalla frames are delicate. Pack the bottle and frame carefully with bubble wrap to ensure the wood does not crack or chip.

faqs.question: Do you buy Highland Park 21 Year?
faqs.answer: Yes, we look for both the older 21 Year releases and the newer airport exclusives.
